TRAVEL TIPS! I just thought I'd give you ladies a few tips for travel! These are just things I've noticed helped, so hopefully they help you on your next trip!! 1️⃣ Buy travel tablets. You dissolve these in water and they are full of vitamins, minerals and electrolytes for hydration! 2️⃣ Drink WATER!! If it's cold, drink warm herbal tea (non caffeinated) 3️⃣ Water for your skin is also important (I break out when my skin gets dry) You need products that will keep your skin hydrated 4️⃣ Bring good walking shoes!! 5️⃣ Research amazing food places in that country BEFORE you go there so you don't end up eating junk food on the run 6️⃣ Get a massage! Planes are horrible sometimes, look after your body by giving it a good stretch out! 7️⃣ Stay off your phone! Put your phone away and enjoy the moment 8️⃣ Travel with your own pillow (and spare pillow cases) 9️⃣ Go for 30 minute walk when you land, this clears your head and may reduce your jet lag 💛💛www.kaylaitsines.com/app
Full body gym workout! 4 laps 💪💪 Set a timer and see how long it takes you!! For my full 28 minute workouts, visit www.kaylaitsines.com/app 💕(link in bio)

👆 Tips to naturally de-stress 💕

1️⃣Avoid Caffeine
I know! I know! but this one really is important. This is because caffeine is a stimulant that increases adrenaline production within in the body, which is what you are trying to keep at bay. So try swapping those daily cups of coffee with decaf, peppermint tea or even an apple. Staying away from caffeine also means cutting out black tea, soft drinks, pre-workouts and too much chocolate. Be mindful of what you are putting into your body, as it truly does have an effect on your stress and anxiety levels.

2️⃣Talk To A Friend
Sometimes when you are feeling very stressed, your problems can seem overwhelming and you just want to shut yourself away from the world. Talking about your problems with someone you trust can help you to rationalise and work out what it is that is triggering those feelings so that you can avoid these in future.

3️⃣Focus On Deep Breathing
This is a really great exercise for anyone who feels overwhelmed and stressed out. If you find yourself drawing up short on air and your chest constricting, focus on deep breathing. Find a quiet space and take a deep breath, counting to three on the way in and then three again on the way out. Really focus on clearing your mind, if you find your thoughts are racing and you can’t turn them off, say the numbers slowly in your head as you are breathing. Repeat this ten times and really focus on slowing down your breathing, nothing else.

4️⃣Schedule 30 Minutes Daily For Relaxation
If you find yourself climbing into bed stressed and your brain can’t switch off, make a conscious effort to schedule in 30 mins for relaxation daily. This can be in the form of a walk, yoga, meditation or just a quiet drive to your favourite location listening to your favourite music.
5️⃣Have a Hot Epsom Salt Bath
Try taking a hot, soothing bath with some epsom salts. These contain magnesium sulfate, which can help to calm your nervous system and promote relaxation. You could also add some lavender essential oil as this is a calming scent which help put you relax and prepare your body for sleep 💤 www.kaylaitsines.com/app

Source: Unknown.

Good morning !! (From Australia) it’s Monday morning here!! I love Monday’s because it’s my “get everything done” day. I do my shopping, clean the house, do some washing, train, cook etc etc. I love setting myself up for the week by being organised😁😁 I also think one of the biggest reasons I enjoy Monday is because I actually don’t drink so I don’t feel sick or tired in the mornings💪 Looking forward to a good day today 😁 Hope everyone had a great weekend!! www.kaylaitsines.com/app

Same time last year!! This was actually a terrible idea😂 I thought it would be cool to do a ‘beach workout’ ... I got sand EVERYWHERE, it was hot, uncomfortable and just not my thing. I absolutely LOVE walking at the beach (on the concrete walks ways haha) but I can’t say I love a beach workout! I like to be in a temperature controlled environment with loud music and all my equipment around me!! How do you ladies workout?? www.kaylaitsines.com/app

Growing up in a Greek household, there was ALWAYS family in and out of our house. Friends were always welcome, there was plenty of food, laughs and love! When starting #bbg, that’s exactly what I wanted for my community ... a feeling of THIS👆 Open doors to a house full of love. All I ever wanted was to make other people happy to to feel good and that has NEVER and will NEVER change!! I hope when you join this community, you feel the same love and sense of “having everything you need” as I did growing up!! ... welcome to my VERY big Greek family 😂... there’s currently 10.5 million of us 💪💪 #bbgcommunity www.kaylaitsines.com/app
